22a48751-d87f-429c-950c-f971ffb5cd71.name: Revenue Management @ Work - Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Revenue Management @ Work Level 1 Learning Labs, consisting of 6 instructor-led sessions totaling 15 hours of virtual in-class time. Extended Stay or Full Service Lifestyle & Luxury Revenue Management.

Complete pre- and post- behavioral and skills assessment. This is used to evaluate growth in skills and behaviors from before and after completion of the course. A final assessment on knowledge gained must also be passed before the learner completes the program.
Learners create an action plan throughout the course that they use to track the implementation of new strategies and behaviors learned from Revenue Management @ Work.
